name: RI_1_1_22_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Unlink_Event
title: RI.1.1.22.1 Evidence of Record Entry Unlink Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Unlink Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Unlink Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD audit each occurrence when linked Record Entries are unlinked from another entry/object.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the organization where Record Entries are unlinked.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the patient who is subject of un-linked Record Entry.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the user unlinking Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the system application which unlinked Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., unlink).

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the date and time Record Entries are unlinked.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entries are unlinked.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22.1#09
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for unlinking Record Entries.
